## Seurat V3

```{r }
library(Matrix)
library(data.table)
library(Seurat)
library(SeuratDisk)
```

```{r}
sp_data_folder = '/nfs/team205/vk7/sanger_projects/cell2location_proj/notebooks/data/visium_cortex_trial/'
sc_data_folder = '/nfs/team205/vk7/sanger_projects/cell2location_proj/notebooks/data/mouse_visium_snrna/'
results_folder = '/nfs/team205/vk7/sanger_projects/cell2location_paper/notebooks/selected_results/mouse_visium_snrna/'

reg_mod_name = 'RegressionNBV2Torch_65covariates_40532cells_12819genes'

```
```{r}
run_name = 'LocationModelLinearDependentWMultiExperiment_59clusters_14968locations_12809genes_n_comb50_mean_var5_inferred_30k'
sp_data_path = paste0(results_folder, run_name, '/')

Convert(paste0(sp_data_path, 'sp_with_clusters.h5ad'), dest = "h5seurat", overwrite = TRUE)
sp_seu = LoadH5Seurat(paste0(sp_data_path, 'sp_with_clusters.h5seurat'))
```

```{r}
# the column for annotations is hard-coded
sc_seu@meta.data$annotation_1 = factor(sc_seu@meta.data$annotation_1)
```

## running Seurat PCA

```{r seurat}
library(dplyr)

sc_seu <- SCTransform(sc_seu, verbose = FALSE) %>% RunPCA(verbose = FALSE)
sp_seu <- SCTransform(sp_seu, verbose = FALSE) %>% RunPCA(verbose = FALSE)

start_time <- Sys.time()

anchors <- FindTransferAnchors(reference = sc_seu, query = sp_seu, normalization.method = "SCT")

predictions.assay <- TransferData(anchorset = anchors, refdata = sc_seu$annotation_1,
                                  weight.reduction = 'pcaproject')

end_time <- Sys.time()
end_time - start_time
```

```{r}
saveRDS(object = predictions.assay,
        file = "/nfs/team205/vk7/sanger_projects/cell2location_paper/notebooks/selected_results/benchmarking/mouse_visium_snrna/seurat_new/results_pca.RDS")

predictions.assay$spot = rownames(predictions.assay)
write.csv(predictions.assay, '/nfs/team205/vk7/sanger_projects/cell2location_paper/notebooks/selected_results/benchmarking/mouse_visium_snrna/seurat_new/results_pca.csv')
predictions.assay[1:5, 1:5]
```

## running Seurat CCA

```{r seurat_cca}
library(dplyr)

sc_seu <- SCTransform(sc_seu, verbose = FALSE) %>% RunPCA(verbose = FALSE)
sp_seu <- SCTransform(sp_seu, verbose = FALSE) %>% RunPCA(verbose = FALSE)

start_time <- Sys.time()

anchors <- FindTransferAnchors(reference = sc_seu, query = sp_seu, normalization.method = "SCT", reduction='cca')

predictions.assay <- TransferData(anchorset = anchors, refdata = sc_seu$annotation_1,
                                  weight.reduction = 'cca')

end_time <- Sys.time()
end_time - start_time
```

```{r}
saveRDS(object = predictions.assay,
        file = "/nfs/team205/vk7/sanger_projects/cell2location_paper/notebooks/selected_results/benchmarking/mouse_visium_snrna/seurat_new/results_cca.RDS")

write.csv(predictions.assay, '/nfs/team205/vk7/sanger_projects/cell2location_paper/notebooks/selected_results/benchmarking/mouse_visium_snrna/seurat_new/results_cca.csv')
predictions.assay[1:5, 1:5]
```
